# Patient Monitoring System

targets.expr: max by (userid) (kafka_consumer_bpsNEWS{topic="processed-topic"}) + max by (userid) (kafka_consumer_respNEWS{topic="processed-topic"}) + max by (userid) (kafka_consumer_pulseNEWS{topic="processed-topic"}) + max by (userid) (kafka_consumer_tempNEWS{topic="processed-topic"})

max by(userid) (kafka_consumer_bpsNEWS{topic="prink-topic"}) + max by(userid) (kafka_consumer_respNEWS{topic="prink-topic"}) + max by(userid) (kafka_consumer_pulseNEWS{topic="prink-topic"}) + max by(userid) (kafka_consumer_tempNEWS{topic="prink-topic"})
